Text:
Greetings Earthlings, well here it is... the whole series in 720p Mp4 format!
Please seed, and check out The Newsroom which is also done by Aaron Sorkin... :)

Thanks so much for this...

I've the origional DVD box sets but the quality there was pretty bad. These 720p version are fantastic.

Thanks again for allowing me to enjoy my favourite series for the fifth time in glorious resolutions!
Yup, nice to watch this in 720p... it's like a really good long film :)
Thanks for this...hopefully will get everything before the Seeds fail...i will seed for at least a month.
thanks for sharing this. please can more people seed though - I am just about getting speeds of 20 kbps on this :(

Sorry my machine crashed and I lost this huge torrent...
Please DL the individual seasons, thanx :(
When filmed in 4:3 then it should be displayed as such.. In this torrent they are not... That being said, quality excellent..
